features.name: Poisonous Vapors
features.description: Save: DC 16 vs DEX, 4 squares in front of you in a square or line, all targets. Hit: 14 (4d6) poison damage and you take half that damage (You are immune to poison). When Bloodied, roll a die 6 and the damage changes from poison to 1-2 : Cold 3-4 : Fire 5-6 : Lightning

features.name: Grab
features.description: Melee: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeon damage and the target must make a DC 16 str saving throw or be grabbed. You can spend an action as usual to remove the grab.

features.name: Devastating Bite
features.description: Melee: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage and 2d6 acid damage. The target then takes ongoing 2d6 acid damage unless they succeed a DC 16 dex saving throw. They can spend an action to automatically remove the acid.

features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
  • Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
  • Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend [2*lvl] hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Paragon Defenses
features.description: When you would fail a saving throw, you may spend 10 hit points to succeed.
